pkgmetadata.longdescription: Read and Write Sparse Matrices in 'SVMLight' and 'LibSVM' Formats // Read and write labelled sparse matrices in text format as used by software such as 'SVMLight', 'LibSVM', 'ThunderSVM', 'LibFM', 'xLearn', 'XGBoost', 'LightGBM', and others. Supports labelled data for regression, classification (binary, multi- class, multi-label), and ranking (with 'qid' field), and can handle header metadata and comments in files.
